bio:
For over a decade, FA has partnered with businesses across every major industry to make amazing products and connect the dots between people, products, and business opportunities. Now, in an increasingly digital world that places the consumer at the center of every interaction, we’re showing businesses how they can connect the dots back to consumers, innovate within predictable budgets, and bring the next generation of digital products and services to market.

FA helps businesses create value across the entire product lifecycle — not just by developing cutting-edge apps, but also by helping make mature products relevant to digitally savvy consumers. Using experience-led design strategy, we also help customers re-imagine business, including the ways they engage consumers, develop products and services, and speed time-to-market. Knowing that businesses have to do more than just keep up with trends, we help them succeed with breakthroughs that disrupt industries and expectations.

FA has always connected dots across ecosystems, bringing together makers and markets to create amazing products. Now we are helping businesses connect all of these dots back to consumers, who not only engage with products and services, but also contribute to their continuous development. We’ve worked with hundreds of companies, learning not only to place consumers at the center of the business, but to also define their strategic relationship with them to better engage consumers and strengthen brands.
I follow US Eastern Standard Time from 8 AM  - 1 PM, Monday through Friday.

abstrac: Creative Design Experts Helping SME's & Entrepreneurs Build their Brands
bio:
✅ SMART Cost-Effective Creative Design Solutions ✅ Consistently Deliver Exceptional ROI's ✅ Graphic Design ✅ Web Design ✅ Video ✅ Brand Identity ✅ Print Design ✅ 3D

We help technology startups, digital agencies and entrepreneurs build their brands with a full range of low-cost design solutions.

You get an expert team of proven professionals for under half the cost of hiring an in-house design and marketing team.

As the Founder of Buzz Media Design, an ROI focused & results oriented Creative Design Agency, I get approached everyday by business owners from different sectors frustrated with client acquisition, looking for sustainable and proven creative ways to bring in new business consistently.

After hundreds of conversations and hours of conference calls, we always come to the same conclusion. These business owners live in a constant fear of losing their current customers and the obscurity of when and where their new one will come from. They are tired from constantly scouring the internet for talented designers, missed deadlines and over-priced, sub-standard designs.

I remember I was in the same situation when I first started Buzz Media Design, with nothing but ambition and an unwavering belief of my ability to help entrepreneurs and businesses thrive. Not knowing if, when or how I'm going to close my next client sometimes kept me up at night. It made me doubt my skills and question my cause and goals. So after years of trial and error, and being mentored by market leaders, I discovered a new possibility that changed everything... With the help of our top-class remote team of design professionals, we've created a sustainable, consistent, and scalable business that helps our clients reach their customer base.
Always available to discuss your upcoming project... give us a Buzz and let's get started!!

abstrac: I provide working projects of high quality on time.
bio:
I have been working in embedded programming for more than 15 years.
Throughout my career I have developed firmware for UAVs, UGVs and other autonomous systems with multiple MCUs or DSPs. I implemented image processing for an optical navigating system. Digital signal processing. Math simulation of the systems under development in Matlab and Mathcad.
I have got experience in firmware development for different MCUs and CPUs (including DSPs): Texas Instruments, STMicroelectronics (STM32, STM8), Microchip/Atmel (PIC, ATSAM, ATMega, including Arduino), SiLabs, Cypress, Analog Devices, NXP, Freescale, Renesas.
Used IDEs are: IAR Embedded Workbench, Keil, Eclipse, AVR/Atmel Studio, Arduino IDE, MPLAB, Code Composer Studio, Simplicity Studio, Segger Embedded Studio, Atollic TrueStudio, STM32CubeIDE, PSoC Designer, CrossWorks, Raisonance Ride7.
Programming languages: C, C++, Assembler (AVR, 8051, PIC, PowerPC), Matlab.
I can work up to 30 hours a week.
